metadata.title: CVE-2023-28686 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Dino before 0.2.3, 0.3.x before 0.3.2, and 0.4.x before 0.4.2 allows attackers to modify the personal bookmark store via a crafted message. The attacker can change the display of group chats or force a victim to join a group chat; the victim may then be tricked into disclosing sensitive information.

criterions.comment: dino-im package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
